body_html:
@ailzhang I checked it out a few times and found nothing wrong, ib test is ok. but

  1. in one mechine test, IB communication form a loop in the protocol layer, data does not pass the network card
  2. in two mechine test, use ib_send_lat test communication , the data pass the network card.

i find the issue: #2903 the problem has been discussed there, the difference is that it get error in the first epoch. In addition, when I set the data loader to 0, it works fine. pytorch version is 0.4.1
body_text:
@ailzhang I checked it out a few times and found nothing wrong, ib test is ok. but

in one mechine test, IB communication form a loop in the protocol layer, data does not pass the network card
in two mechine test, use ib_send_lat test communication , the data pass the network card.

i find the issue: #2903  the problem has been discussed there, the difference is that it get error in the first epoch. In addition, when I set the data loader to 0, it works fine. pytorch version is 0.4.1
body:
@ailzhang I checked it out a few times and found nothing wrong, ib test is ok. but 
1. in one mechine test, IB communication form a loop in the protocol layer, data does not pass the network card
2. in two mechine test, use ib_send_lat test communication , the data pass the network card.

i find the issue: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2903  the problem has been discussed there, the difference is that it get error in the first epoch. In addition, when I set the data loader to 0, it works fine. pytorch version is 0.4.1
